title: Ok what's going on here...I have a reconnect screen and my last game was an hour ago
body: Log into my account like 5 min ago and i get a reconnect screen....My last game was like an hour ago....So I clicked reconnect and it failed then I relog my account and HEY it's the same  reconnect screen...What up yo!......

replies.body:
Hey there,

This should've resolved itself by now, these are known as Ghost Games and are caused when your client/the server doesn't receive the proper "end game" message.

These should resolve themselves within a few hours at most.
Ah never mind.... Seems player at the NA server faced this too (http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/E1AOtxR9-reconnect-bug)
